text: Hagi ana a'mo'ma agrama avesi nezmantea vene'neramima zamarotago huno'ma vaniana ome zamaze'origahie. Hagi ana vene'neraminkura hakeno vano hugahianagi, zamageno eri forera osugahie. Zamageno'ma erifore'ma osnuno'a agra amanage hugahie, nagra ete ese ve'ni'are vanue. Na'ankure agranema mani'noana knare hu'na mani'noane huno hugahie.
